Text: Don't think this works. Installed it to my main Kingdoms of Amulur folder; at the end of which it opened 3 webpages - first to AviaRa's page, then a gaming forum, then a Romanian commerce sit. When I try to run it I get a 'System Error: The program can't start because binkw32.dll is missing from your computer' although the main game runs fine. When I do run the game it still says "Teeth of Naros" is available for download still and there's nothing in the 'special deliveries chest' in Gorhart. I don't think the game recognized it.

The .exe opens some sites after installation is finished. So be prepared on that, they seem safe sites, but you never know. There are referrals in it though.
This goes for all "Aviara" torrents.
